description: I enjoy this best with 2 players - it is fast, simple and somewhat chess like in how you have time things outs according to what your opponent is doing. One of the few area control games I enjoy. A wonderful game, easy to teach with lots of a variability.
Good, it doesn't call to me to play it though.
FOFA Candidat

title: Trade offe...
description: Trade offers must take into consideration, A spiders web; be not afraid; cursed!; Grand dames; leaders; and Tales and legends expansions.

title: Love the v...
description: Love the variable powers and how they change game to game. Light area control, with special rules and exceptions driven by your race combination. You also have the chance to change your race as their power wanes or a better combo is affordable.Hit with the boys.

title: Love the v...
description: Love the variable powers and how they change game to game. Light area control, with special rules and exceptions driven by your race combination. You also have the chance to change your race as their power wanes or a better combo is affordable.Hit with the boys.

title: 2-6 player...
description: 2-6 players, 60 minutes, light medium, area control/war gameHave played with 2, 3 and 4 players and all work quite well. The game has different boards for the various number of players, so it will always be a world too small for everyone, which ensures there's plenty of action  The game looks great and the numerous combinations of races and special powers (which are different every game) ensure that replayability is high.

title: i realy wa...
description: i realy wanted to like this game.. but i hate the downtime between turns.. it realy spoils it for me.  some games have a bearable downtime as they are quite heavy and that's part of the deal.. but this is too light for the down time it has.

title: [SOLD June...
description: [SOLD June 2017]I like the simplified combat mechanics.  Every game is different due to the huge number of race/power combinations.  Sure it's chaotic, but that's part of the fun.  I especially like that players are never eliminated; very high revenge factor in this one generates spicy table talk.

title: Art and th...
description: Art and theme is awesome.  Easy game to learn and plays fairly quickly.  The race/trait combos expands the replay value for a long time.Only downside is the box insert.  No clear way to pack everything nice and neat back into the box.  The armies tray does not hold everything evenly and the instruction book diagram for the insert in the back is garbage.

title: Good looki...
description: Good looking, fast. "Wargame" that my wife plays (yeah I know its not really a wargame). My kid somehow can play this one really good, winning a lot without me holding any punches. (6-year old)As long as someone doesn't start to think too much about the game and just plays fast and to the spirit of it, its fun and quick game.

title: No Review Title
description: No Review Description

title: One of my ...
description: One of my wife's favorite games, I like the risk feel without the death spiral and with a much more interesting theme in my tastes anyway.

title: To me it i...
description: To me it is like Risk without the random dice rolling. Always have fun playing Small World and teaching others how to play.

title: I bought i...
description: I bought it simply because it was recommended as a must have. Do not understand why :(

description: Better than Vinci. Shorter, more thematic, prettier, streamlined, and with fewer unbalanced combos.

title: Expansions...
description:
Expansions:
- Be Not Afraid
- Grand Dames of Small World

Easy to learn, hard to master area control game. Lots of replayability and there's always expansions out there if you start to feel bored.

description: It's a decent-ish game, but I'm not really a fan.
